abstract: China’s securities regulator may introduce futures contracts on the country’s stock indexes as early as March, an official with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.
snippet: China’s securities regulator may introduce futures contracts on the country’s stock indexes as early as March, an official with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: China’s securities regulator may introduce futures contracts on the country’s stock indexes as early as March, an official with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News.

headline.main: China May Allow Futures Contracts in March
